entries.title: Suspect sought after New Jersey synagogue targeted by Molotov cocktail overnight
entries.description: Security video footage showed that the Molotov cocktail thrown at Temple Ner Tamid in New Jersey occurred at 3:19 a.m.

entries.title: Missouri mom convicted of killing her infant twins
entries.description: The Missouri mother reported that her infant twins were stillborn.

entries.title: Trucks crash into commuters in Nigeria's south; 20 dead
entries.description: Authorities in Nigeria say 20 people including children have died in road crashes involving trucks over the weekend

entries.title: Kansas City police find body in man's car after towing it
entries.description: Family members are questioning why Kansas City police didn't find a man's body in the cargo area of his own SVU until after they towed it to a Missouri police station earlier this month

entries.title: '24,' 'Runaways' actor Annie Wersching has died at 45
entries.description: Actor Annie Wersching, best known for playing FBI agent Renee Walker in the series “24” and providing the voice for Tess in the video game “The Last of Us,” has died

entries.title: Baby girl found abandoned in Florida an hour after birth
entries.description: A Florida baby is safe after being found abandoned outdoors about an hour after being born

entries.title: McCarthy, Biden to meet on spending and debt; McCarthy says there will be no default
entries.description: Speaker Kevin McCarthy says he is set to meet with President Joe Biden on Wednesday to discuss federal government spending and raising the debt ceiling

entries.title: Georgia's Bennett arrested in Texas for public intoxication
entries.description: Georgia QB led the Bulldogs to their second straight national championship.

entries.title: WATCH:  Camera captures sky spiral after rocket launch
entries.description: A camera atop Hawaii’s tallest mountain has captured what looks like a spiral swirling through the night sky. Researchers believe it was from the launch of a military GPS satellite.

entries.title: Elon Musk's mysterious ways on display in Tesla tweet trial
entries.description: The trial revolves around one of Musk's most polarizing pursuits -- tweeting.

entries.title: Three kids, one adult killed in Iowa crash that also hurt 9
entries.description: Authorities have identified the three young children and one adult who died.

entries.title: Police: 1 of 2 boys recovered after Amber Alert has died
entries.description: Authorities say one of the twin Ohio boys who became the center of a statewide AMBER Alert that garnered nationwide attention last month has died

entries.title: Iowa police won't release videos of officers shooting teen
entries.description: Police are refusing to release body camera video of three Des Moines officers fatally shooting a 16-year-old boy after he pointed a gun at them last month because state law prevents releasing the footage showing a minor committing a “delinquent act” be...

entries.title: 'Don’t be numb to this': Battling despair over gun deaths
entries.description: Increasingly it feels like America is at war with itself

entries.title: Israeli-Palestinian cauldron tests US as Blinken visits
entries.description: An alarming spike in Israeli-Palestinian violence and sharp responses by both sides are testing the Biden administration as U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken plunges into a cauldron of deepening mistrust and anger on visits to Israel and the West ...

entries.title: Why police training in the US falls short compared to the rest of the world: Report
entries.description: As Americans debate police reform, a law enforcement report shows significant gaps in how police in the U.S. are trained compared to their international counterparts.

entries.title: Djokovic beats Tsitsipas for 10th Australian Open, 22nd Slam
entries.description: Novak Djokovic has claimed his 10th Australian Open championship and 22nd Grand Slam title overall by beating Stefanos Tsitsipas 6-3, 7-6 (4), 7-6 (5)

entries.title: Australia mining company sorry for losing radioactive device
entries.description: A mining corporation has apologized for losing a highly radioactive capsule over a 870-mile stretch of Western Australia

entries.title: Tyre Nichols: What the footage reveals, and questions that remain
entries.description: The release of the videos sheds more light on what happened to Tyre Nichols on the night of Jan. 7, though it also prompts more questions about the incident.

entries.title: UK leader fires party chairman over tax bill allegations
entries.description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has fired the chairman of his ruling Conservative Party over a “serious breach” of the ministerial code

entries.title: Turkey issues travel warning to Europe following protests
entries.description: Turkey has issued a travel warning for its citizens living in or planning on going to European countries, citing Islamophobia and anti-Turkish demonstrations

entries.title: Passenger bus in Pakistan crashes, catches fire killing 40
entries.description: A government official says a bus accident in southern Pakistan has left 40 people dead

entries.title: Iran says drone attack targets defense facility in Isfahan
entries.description: Iran’s Defense Ministry says one of its factories was attacked in Isfahan.

entries.title: 1 dead, 4 injured in Baltimore shooting, crash: Police
entries.description: One person was killed and four others were injured in a shooting that took place Saturday in Baltimore, police said.

entries.title: Arizona Republicans pick former Trump official to lead party
entries.description: Arizona Republicans have selected Jeff DeWit to be the party’s next chairman.
